text: Welcome to module 2 guys. Very briefly, the structure of the module is broken down again into theoretical principles. There'll be 20 of those. We'll then have a lot more learning videos this time around. We're going to spend quite a bit of time on the blackboard going over a lot of principle understanding as well as obviously starting to develop some of the key strategies. We'll then, we will not have any profile replay in module 2, play done in module 3. Then we'll have four concept checkers again just to ensure you understand the principles dealt with in each one of the four parts and then we'll finish or each part will finish with the playbook entries and there will be 17 playbook entries for you to insert into your very own playbook. Enjoy the module!
